subject: Re: [junit] Re: Need to get the Error, Failure and the CallStack 	after each testcase run
msgSnippet: The following code... although not in a tear down, will provide the requirement of placing the information in a database. @Rule public MethodRule watchman= new
messageBody:
The following code... although not in a tear down, will provide the
requirement of placing the information in a database.

@Rule
public MethodRule watchman= new TestWatchman() {
@Override
public void failed(Throwable e, FrameworkMethod method) {
// enter failed data into the database.
}

@Override
public void succeeded(FrameworkMethod method) {
// enter success data into the database.
}
};

It should be noted that this runs after each test. (I think) One of
your later messages, #22597 from groups.yahoo.com message counter
thingy, implies that you only want to do this after all the tests. In
that case you'd have to write something to collect the results, and
publish them to the database during the @AfterClass annotated method.
